title: Mischievous FTP
description: Exploit misconfigured permissions on an FTP server to retrieve sensitive information.
hints: Start by connecting to the FTP server using an anonymous login.
Look for directories or files that seem out of place or have unusual permissions.
The flag is stored in a file that should normally be secured.
learningObjectives: Understand how FTP servers manage file permissions.
Practice identifying and exploiting weak configurations in FTP services.
Learn to navigate and search through FTP directories efficiently.
